text: Bertram's face was grim."You think it was the Snort, don't you? John gave a short laugh.I did, he said;"but I'd better stop thinking that now.Pericles is fitted with an identically similar one."
handwritten_text: Bertram's face was grim."You think it was the Snort, don't you? John gave a short laugh.I did, he said;"but I'd better stop thinking that now.Pericles is fitted with an identically similar one."
